entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lac Raglan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:25 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangiqsujuaq Airport 02:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -34.0°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Humidity: 54 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -40.2°C
Wind: W 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 33. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
